name: Import existing VM with a single disk - VMware vSphere
description: This template can be used to import an existing virtual machine with a single disk into IBM Cloud Automation Manager.  It can be modified to import a VM with multiple disks.

metadata.longDescription: This template can be used to import an existing virtual machine with a single disk into IBM Cloud Automation Manager.  It can be modified to import a VM with multiple disks.

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description: This template cannot be used for deploying new virtual machines.
